message: Let's split the money fairly. I propose a 70/30 split.
You wanted to start with a 70/30 split, but I think I can do better than that. How about a 90/10 split?
Considering the inflation, let's adjust our proposal. I suggest a 60/40 split this time.
I'll meet you in the middle this time. A 50/50 split seems fair, considering the inflation.
